name: Defer and schedule (buy time without losing momentum)
summary: When you need time, defer with professionalism, propose a concrete next step, and preserve the frame.
goal: Avoid rushed concessions and keep control of timing.
counterparty_guidance: Use the pause to gather data and reduce pressure, not to drift.
Set a clear next step, deadline, and agenda before ending.
Confirm what decisions will be made at the next touchpoint.
Avoid open-ended delays that weaken your position.
